## ModalComponentBaseProps.movable property

whether to make the modal "movable" (drag around). Can be provided as boolean or the parameter object to [@svelte-put/movable](https://github.com/vnphanquang/svelte-put/blob/main/packages/movable/api/docs/movable.movableparameters.md) Defaults to `false`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
movable?: boolean | MovableParameters;
```
